prompts: Create a cute bipedal Pokemon with a skull helmet and a brown body.
I want a ghostly Pokemon that wears a skull, showcasing a blend of eerie and adorable.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves into a larger creature, starting as a small bone-wielding figure.
Make a Pokemon inspired by a dinosaur, featuring a unique helmet and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in caves, with a brown color palette and a mysterious aura.
Design a small Pokemon with a distinct bone feature, perfect for a ghost-type theme.
Show me a Pokemon that is both resilient and curious, with a focus on earthy colors.
